item.name: 1066, Tears to Many Mothers: The Battle of Hastings Card Game
item.comment: sold on 2021-03-03 : + Graphics / Graphic art is wonderful - Fight preparation is boring, too few interactions in 60% of the game - Not enough combo when you build your army array - or always the same

item.name: 1862: Railway Mania in the Eastern Counties
item.comment: Primary note 9/10 after 2 games : It is hard to say if its a good game or not, choices are challenging, long term strategy depends on good / bad player interactions. The economy part is fun but struggling. The layout map seems to have few very interresting spots. Managing rusted trains is all the point of this game : your companies cannot produce dividentes except if you merge them.

item.name: 51st State: Master Set
item.comment: This game is fun, solo, easy to explain, difficult to master. A good game for me. A little bit not enough aggressive to other player for for me -1

item.name: 7 Wonders Duel
item.comment:
Good : like chess, you have to do a lot of computations to win. With random hidden resources (cards) but also a lot of visible cards : good for those who hates dices.
Sold April 2021

item.name: Age of Civilization
item.comment: D.A moche, ne donne pas envie d'y jouer.

item.name: Anachrony
item.comment:
Very hard to explain : players must anticipate each turn what they will do ... like a poker.
Sold 2021-03-03

item.name: Architects of the West Kingdom
item.comment: Great theme. Simple rules - easy to explain. Great ambiance around the table : I like the jail mechanisms, but it doesn 't give enough advantage(s)

item.name: Architects of the West Kingdom: Works of Wonder
item.comment: This extension do not add tons of things to / renew the base game. I thing the base game was enough.

item.name: Ark Nova
item.comment: Good. Nearly no interactions - so a multi-solo game - so a 8 minus 1.

item.name: Black Angel
item.comment: Don't understand / like very well the game-play. Graphic don't help us to get it onto the table. Feel I would like same kind of theme but with a much better art.

item.name: Bonfire
item.comment: Like the graphical aspect of the game. Like how deep games run: buy missions, buy path, open portals, call guardians, and combine everything around bonfire. Resource management is very very tight : bonuses are not bonuses, they are mandatory to accumulate other resources Runs over missions is tricky between players.

item.name: Carnegie
item.comment: Construction tool. Nice mechanisms. I fear this game will not have an high replay-ability as the beginning of the party is nearly always the same; and there is not a lot of paths to victory.

item.name: The Castles of Burgundy: The Card Game
Clank!: Les Aventuriers du Deck-Building
item.comment: Excellent, Very enthusiasm at each game. Fun to replay, 2 maps, a lots of cards with strange effects .... CLANK ... cames THE DRAGON :)

item.name: Council of Shadows
item.comment: 8-1 because of errors on cards (FR+EN edtion)

item.name: D-Day at Tarawa
item.comment: Very tactic... Enemies move forward, jump on you, renforces, Excellent ! but not for your brain... good luck for winning in 2 days

item.name: Dark Souls: The Card Game
item.comment: No graphics or ugly graphics on cards, No funny events, All 400 cards are nearly the same cards.

item.name: Dawn of the Zeds (Third Edition)
item.comment: I ve won a long game ! After an infinite amount of play ... I ve won a long game ! ... In normal difficulty :| :) :) :)

item.name: Discovery: The Evolution Game – Prehistory
item.comment: This game have very beautiful arts on cards. It feels like a game to learn human History, more a history book made with cards mades for children.

item.name: Dual Powers: Revolution 1917
item.comment: This is an apparently quick and simple game... But will playing, it appears to have several very interesting tactics to gain control over areas. So for a small price, a good game.

item.name: Dune: Imperium
item.comment: Good small game, simple, easy to explain, ... need at least 1 or 2 games for the players to understand "multiple" paths to victory. Graphic theme is a bit lower than I should expect for a "Dune" license. Seems at is best with 4 players (with 3 players - there is not a lot of issues then placing workers).

item.name: The Everrain
item.comment:
2022-09-21: sold
This game is quite good : You move, you accumulate stuff, sometime "human-beast" battles, sometime "ship-vs-ship" battles, It s a race... Need to score enough against the game.
So several good ideas ( discover island ...)
Unfortunately for me I already have several "discover then encounter" games, so I sold this one instead of the others. This is because I feel it need perhaps one or 2 expansions to feel the game 100% complete.

item.name: Fields of Fire
item.comment:
Too many useless tokens & no default insert with a too small box. Too many rules or too many useless rule exceptions. Book without token definition, same token have multiple names in the documentation everywhere, and no reference list. The book is written i a "reverse" order of the steps in the game. Tons of errors in the 2nd edition of the manual. Token and / or Missions have missing information to understand which correct token should be used. The book and / or the missions books don't display tokens pages after pages ... so there is no definition section, names (step? team? section ? squad ? LAT?) so we don't know what token should be used in the mission - and always : no picture anywhere get the name definition image of each token.
This is an UN-achieved game that you will pay 80 €.

item.name: Fields of Fire: The Bulge Campaign
Flying Colors
item.comment: Bought for playing it in group and alone because GMT said solo playable = 9. There is not bot, so for me solo playability = 0. It take a lot of space on your table(s) because of the wind issues. But the game by itseft is very good, nearly 3 or 4 cross-tables to check only per ship; so I would give it a 7 or 8 without the fake description.

item.name: Friday
item.comment:
Fun to play 5 to 10 times, but hard to win: depends a lot of the first turn (easy). Next turns (middle, hard) are very depending of the first one.
Sold on 2021-04-10 because it s a too small game for me.

item.name: Gaia Project
item.comment: One of the best strategic space-opera board game. A little bit too heavy to set-it up more often on table.

item.name: Ghost Stories
item.comment: Story very fun. Theme very well used. Hard game but a lot easier with 4 brains around the table :)

item.name: Ghost Stories: White Moon
item.comment: Add a newer dimension of the game: "villagers to be saved". But it is so hard to even save them, ... so I "sacrify" them to win time, to kill Wu-Feng :)

item.name: Gloom of Kilforth: A Fantasy Quest Game
Gloom of Kilforth: Encounters Expansion Pack
Gloom of Kilforth: Tears of Kilforth Promo Cards
Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion
item.comment: FR version After first chapters, seems good : 8/10 Retards engineers made the insert ... so need external boxes for sleeved cards, bags, etc ... (-2) 8 - 2 = 6

item.name: God of War: The Card Game
item.comment: Simple game, not so easy when you fully follow rules :) Ennemy tables are really beautiful... A little bit disapointed by graphic art of the players cards :( and the fact that they did not have power variety I.E too many similar cards.

item.name: The Great Wall
item.comment: One issue I ve found weird with this game is the semi-cooperative / competitive aspect of the game... On one side, we all need to defend the great wall On the other side, we must do whatever is possible to win more point than other, up to plan some weird action, to make thir action less efficient. Also tactical cards, and strategic cards seems a little tricky to use as the game is overly tactic for me (it is difficult to plan to buy then use a specific card) and the text on the card is very small and doesn't help In anyway the game feel fresh and looks like other tower defense game with a good design: manage emergencies. What is wrong : stickers 7-3 => 4 : do anyone see what gives stickers aspect after 2 years ?

item.name: Great Western Trail (Second Edition)
item.comment: The game is good if you like to rush. -1 for the box not accepting sleeved cards

item.name: Hallertau
item.comment: a little disappointed by the complexity, i mean new players will be just crushed by experienced players.

item.name: Hellboy: The Board Game
item.comment:
Too expensive for the content: too few missions, too few and bad designed cards.
Only if - you like to paint your miniatures, - you like to fight always the exactly same minions, - you like pure cooperative games.

item.name: High Frontier 4 All
item.comment: French Deluxe release here (including modules 0, 1 & 2), Not OK version : - at least 30 cards miss-printed from module 2 & 3, with the dome icon not printed, - Missions / targets impossible to reach (not tested ?) so they need to update the living - rules, - several texts with errors or not translated in books, cards doesn't have the same name in samples Paying 95 € a deluxe 4th edition with this hugh amount of miss-prints is not acceptable. --- Acheté la version Deluxe (incluant les modules 0, 1 & 2) Pas une version acceptable du tout : - Au 30 cartes sont mal imprimés sur les modules 2 & 3, avec l'icône dôme non imprimé. - Des missions / objectifs imbossible (pas testé ?) si bien qu'ils retouchent les règles en live, - Pleins d'erreurs de traduction dans les livres, ou les cartes ne portent pas le bon nom. Payer 95 € une version DELUXE en 4ème édition avec un nombre pareil de bugs n'est pas acceptable.

item.name: Hitler's Reich: WW2 in Europe
item.comment: Need to play more... ... Too many IF ... THEN ... ELSE ... in the rules. Feel good for "history telling", but not for me. Between 6-8

item.name: Illuminati
item.comment: Too many computation, feel to play a war-game.

item.name: Imperium: Legends
item.comment: This games contains a lot of mistakes / no uprade pack, always need to check before playing it ... The insert doesn't fit with sleeved cards. A lot of issues without answers in the rulebook. --- Jeu FRANCAIS plein d'erratas à télécharger avant de jouer... L'insert qui ne tolère pas de cartes sleevés... La règle du jeu qui est pas évidente du tout à absorber, avec pleins de questions sans réponses.

item.name: In the Hall of the Mountain King
item.comment: Great Colors, Materials, Gameplay -1 for "0" interactions between play .i.E This is a multiplayer solo

item.name: In the Hall of the Mountain King: Cursed Mountain
item.comment: Great Colors, Materials, Gameplay -1 for "0" interactions between play .i.E This is a multiplayer solo

item.name: Kepler-3042
item.comment: Weird resource management - seems more like a puzzle to optimize 16 actions than a true explore & expand game.

item.name: Last Aurora
item.comment: Rules book a little bit weird but this game have some different mechanisms to learn so it fun to learn and optimize.

item.name: Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game
item.comment: Simple rules, hard too win, even better with the first expansion, variants like hidden good / bad agenda, facehuggers !

item.name: Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game Expansion
The LOOP
item.comment: Quick setup, fast play, fun, semi-expert... what else ?

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
item.comment: For new players, be careful : t s a FFG pay to win. First scenario OK, Second and third scenarios : quite boring / impossible with base-box.

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Revised Core Set
item.comment: Pay (extensions...) to Win "FFG" game -1 Not correct insert that support sleeved cards -1 Nothing for ordering & split cards -1 So a good game but very expensive.

item.name: Machina Arcana (Second/Third Edition)
item.comment: Not sleevable cards in this game with a lot of 46x80 card size : nearly only Machina Arcana, where no one sells this sleeve's size. ... for most important deck cards that you need to sleeve. Super boring, as you always need to shuffle them 5-6 time per game. So 8 -2 (non standard sized card -1 too small insert for sleeved cards = 6

item.name: Mage Wars
item.comment: Not enough players around me to go deeper in the strategic aspect of the deck building. This game need same group of people to play with to get the best of this game. Party after Party you and your opponent must takes time to improve the deck and adapt the cards against the opponent strategy which is a really great aspect of the game.

item.name: Maquis
item.comment:
Hate the commercial process: * Core box contains 50% of the extension (27€) but half the game. * Extensions contains 4 cards 3 City tokens So it is a 50% game + useless content, with 4 carts + 3 tokens for 7.5 € so 7-6=1 Even the rule consider the extension as the "normal" game. This is an horrible commercial way to force us to buy the extension. Nothing justify the fact to split the game like this for 4 cards & 3 tokens as the extension cames out at the same time in store.
If all sellers starts to sell games by 50% parts, i ll stop buying half-products.

item.name: Marvel Champions: The Card Game
item.comment: (+) Good base game... :) I like a lot each minion and hero, (+) In expansions, they all have their own capabilities, very great. (-) No re-playable "Story" / "Campaign" mode, only fighting minions. (-) For minion extensions, I feel it become (with Galaxy's Most Wanted) a Pay To Win. (-) way too expensive in the long run with extension.

item.name: Marvel Champions: The Card Game – Sinister Motives
Mint Works
item.comment: Fast worker placement game. Not very engaging. Sold 03/2021

item.name: Multiuniversum
item.comment: Sold on 2021-04-10 : was not for me : Strategy is not really possible because of the few amount of cards in hand. Very difficult to use "power" of some cards.

item.name: Nemesis
item.comment: Should give 7 to 8 for the game play. + 0 for the box that deny to store sleeved cards, but that deny also to store standard cards unsleeved and tokens. I am playing 140 € a game with a box which is useless because nothing fit ? Only tolerable for a box of at most 30 € not 140 € !

item.name: Nemo's War (Second Edition)
item.comment: Box is too small for sleeved cards. No refreshen graphic for utlimate edition. Game too random to be a game : looks more an experience; have the feeling of never controlling anything well.

item.name: One Deck Dungeon: Forest of Shadows
Pendragon: The Fall of Roman Britain
item.comment: Solitaire playability = 0, not 9. The automata is way too complicated. To be interesting the game requires 4 players and only 4 players.

item.name: Pericles: The Peloponnesian Wars
item.comment: Very Good Game - But unfortunately too many IFs in the rules to make it easy to explain to any other players. Sold 02/09/2022 - too many special cases - not enough gamers around me for this kind of games

item.name: Race for the Galaxy
item.comment: First games where very deceptive, stranges icons. But after few games, it s look like a Citadel for adults: ancicipate every enemy tactics, and you will play 4x way faster than the others players : player lonely without watching the other: you will not understand what happend :) you lose ! Good game at end.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Room 25 Ultimate
item.comment: art is bad gameplay is weak

item.name: Shadow Kingdoms of Valeria
item.comment: No interaction - or very few - between players Too Multi-Players-Solo oriented Combos not really interesting Not deep enough game for the price : 50 € / Paris Solo useless and / or boring

item.name: Shadowrun: Crossfire
item.comment: Just not tested / balanced ... :( I.E with less than 4 players, you can instant loose..

item.name: Silent Victory: U.S. Submarines in the Pacific, 1941-45
item.comment:
Hi, very repetitive, very few decisions : - Detect enemies ? so launch dices ... - Decide to wait for night ? so launch dices ... - Decide amount of Torpedo ? then launch dices ... - Escort tracking you ? so launch dices ... - Repair ? so launch dices... - Improvements at refit phase ? launch dices ... And you have to COMPUTE a lot of boring parameter tables like a COMPUTER, I want to play a game, I don't want to execute a program (ie the rules with 25 pages). I don't see a lot of decisions that make me feel controlling something, as I only follow the "storyline". I feel they are much more interesting "push your luck" games elsewhere.
Sold 2021-03-30

item.name: Skies Above Britain
item.comment:
Still unable to play the game without the rulebooks on knees
Too many if ... then ... but if ... then ... else

item.name: Solar Storm
item.comment: Micro-Tower defense, too small gameplay for the price. Don't like the gameplay : (-) When I won I feel it was too easy (-) When I lose I feel it was too random based on card (-) Actions on cards are weird (-) Way too expensive for the content - same cards everywhere Perhaps too easy or too difficult for me Sold 2022-09-08

item.name: Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game
item.comment: Insane. Hard. Immersive for so few cards.

item.name: Star Realms
item.comment: Very funny. A lot of surprising combo. launched at end of any games. Somes games to accelerare, some others tends to become slower and slower. For thoses how like fast fights against the others :)

item.name: Star Wars: Outer Rim
item.comment: (+) Great theme. (-) Multi-Solo game. Nearly no interaction with other players.

item.name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
item.comment: Good "pandemic" game, Still expansive for the few materials it contains. -1

item.name: Struggle for the Galactic Empire
item.comment: You learn the game, You follow rules 95% of the time: Each turn, your eyes are in the rules book, following IF and IF and IF conditions, forever You take 5% of the gameplay time to really play & take decisions. Also: - Map is not a mounted map for 67€ - Token as just the level 0 of quality : unpunching them will destroy them, depunching them well take 8H - Each turn is overly long, long, long and repetitive.

item.name: Taggle
item.comment: I think 0 card make me laugh... too expensive even if it s free

item.name: Teotihuacan: City of Gods
item.comment: Can hardly pay it ... too many computation, graphics not very good, no funny moments, no developments (like i prefer in Gaia Project) 0 for the insert sell 2022-09

item.name: Terraforming Mars
item.comment: For a "building" game, very good. Would need a few scenario immersion. But very enjoyable.

item.name: This War of Mine: The Board Game
item.comment: My new Robinson Crusoe survivor game

item.name: Tiny Epic Galaxies
item.comment:
Looks like Race For The Galaxy on one mechanism : you can "follow" the action of another player. This allow you to optimize your own actions that you expect no one will take next turn.
Sold on 2021-03 : not interested anymore by a small part of RftG

item.name: Tiny Epic Quest
item.comment: Duplicated game mechanic of Race For The Galaxy
item.conditiontext: Excellent, Incomplete, missing only one artefact.

item.name: Totemix
item.comment: this "game" doesn't provide any feeling of a "game", weak aspect ... somes voters gives a 10/10 for their first game...

item.name: Twilight Inscription
item.comment: not for me

item.name: Ultimate Railroads
item.comment: I fear a little bit about replayability but let s see

item.name: V-Sabotage
item.comment: Clean rules. Can become very tactic. Much more fun than Fields of Fire with much less rules.

item.name: Warp's Edge
item.comment: Very small game, price not aligned with the content. Even small, that the extension is mandatory to feel having the complete game. Sold 2022-09-09 - Too similar with bigger games in my collection

item.name: Warp's Edge: Viren Invasion
item.comment: Too expansive for this low amount of content Sold 2022-09-09 - Too similar with bigger games in my collection

item.name: Wild Space
item.comment: Sold on 2021-04 : I would like to love this game : + You can create few combo between cards + There is a "marketplace" for competition between players + The graphics pf the cards are wonderful - No interaction / competition between players it is a race to victory point, so a multiplayer solo - I would expect more combo, be able to fight other players - Probably a game for very young players

item.name: Zona: The Secret of Chernobyl
item.comment: First games seems cool... even if it was epic fails. Need to run everywhere on the map "faster" than the others to become stronger. Seems more difficult than what I ve read here and there. I will have to read the rules a third time to be sure i did not miss something that can preserve my life a little bit longer :) Few interactions between players but they can really can hurt a lot.
